Disease.Name: MUCOPOLYSACCHARIDOSIS VII; SLY SYNDROME
Disease.Summary: very rare (1:1500000) ;autosomal recessive ;2 types: a severe neonatal form may be present in utero and at birth (hydrops fetalis)
